target: How many nights will you be staying?
context: <user>  Hi there. Can you help me find a train to Cambridge on Thursday? <system>  I can. Will you be departing from London Kings Cross? <user>  No, I'm coming from Ely. <system>  What time would you like to travel? <user>  I would like to arrive in Cambridge by 16:15. <system>  I would recommend the TR7745 train that arrives at 07:52. Would that work? <user>  I need the travel time for that. <system>  It is 17 minutes.<user>  can you see about reservations at the aylesbray lodge guest house <system>  Yes, I can. Will it be for for just 1 night?<user>  Actually, let's not worry about booking it just now. Can you narrow down where it is for me with the area at postcode? <system>  Sure. It's in the south of town with postcode cb17sr. Can I help you with anything else?<user>  No, that seems like everything. Go ahead and book it, and we should be done here. <system>
